document.query: CREATE TABLE `client_sale_order` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `client_id` bigint(20), `paypal_details_id` bigint(20), `package_id` bigint(20), `payment_amount` decimal(20,4), `discount_amount` decimal(20,4), `redeem_amount` decimal(20,4), `shipping_fee` decimal(20,4), `payment_tax` decimal(20,4), `release_amount` decimal(20,4), `payment_method` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `payment_expired_date` date, `status` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `promotion` tinyint(1), `promotion_code` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `quotation_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `quotation_date` datetime, `quotation_expired_date` date, `quotation` bigint(20), `proforma_invoice_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `proforma_invoice_date` datetime, `proforma_invoice` bigint(20), `invoice_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `invoice_date` datetime, `invoice` bigint(20), `tracking_no` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `credit_release_at` datetime, `released` tinyint(1), `request_verify_at` datetime, `verified` tinyint(4), `payment_verified_at` datetime, `seen` tinyint(4), `refund` tinyint(1), `remark` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `payslip` bigint(20), `receipt` bigint(20), `receipt_id` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `billing_address` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `shipping_address` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `updated_at` datetime, `created_at` datetime, `delivery_method` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
